item.title: 法官认定非法垄断后，美国寻求分拆谷歌广告技术产品
item.description: 周一的一份法庭文件显示，美国司法部已建议 Alphabet 旗下的谷歌剥离其 AdX 广告市场和广告服务器 DFP，此前联邦法官认定该公司非法主导了两个在线广告技术市场。【原文：The U.S. Department of Justice has proposed that Alphabet's Google divest its AdX advertising marketplace and ad server DFP, a court filing showed on Monday, after a federal judge found the company illegally dominated two online ad-tech markets.】

item.title: 早间竞价美元抛售暂缓
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】

item.title: IBM 首席执行官争夺人工智能市场和更多美国投资
item.description: IBM 周二在拥挤的人工智能领域大展拳脚，兜售可以帮助客户为其关键业务应用管理人工智能代理舰队的工具。【原文：IBM on Tuesday made a play for more sales in the crowded artificial intelligence field, touting tools that could help customers manage a fleet of AI agents for their key business applications.】

item.title: 台湾外长将访问德克萨斯州促进贸易关系
item.description: 台湾外长办公室周二表示，台湾外长将访问美国得克萨斯州，在一个关于人工智能（AI）的论坛上发表演讲，并促进商业和贸易关系，因为台北正寻求促进投资和抵御关税威胁。【原文：Taiwan's foreign minister will visit the U.S. state of Texas to speak at a forum on artificial intelligence (AI) and promote business and trade ties, his office said on Tuesday, as Taipei seeks to bolster investment and see off the threat of tariffs.】

item.title: 南华早报》报道：贸易战冲击香港货运业
item.description: 据《南华早报》报道，香港的货运代理行业正受到中美贸易战的影响，从5月12日开始的一周内，从香港到北美西海岸的集装箱运力有41%被取消。【原文：Hong Kong's freight forwarding industry is reeling from the U.S.-China trade war with 41% of container capacity from the city to North America's west coast cancelled for the week starting May 12, the South China Morning Post reported.】

item.title: 股市漂移，美元持稳，焦点转向亚洲货币
item.description: 周二，全球股市维持窄幅震荡，美元兑亚洲货币收复了近期的部分失地，原因是投资者再次对美国关税及其对经济增长的影响表示担忧。【原文：Global stocks held tight ranges on Tuesday and the dollar clawed back some of its recent losses against Asian counterparts as investors revived concerns about U.S. tariffs and their impact on economic growth.】

item.title: 中国假日消费增长，但贸易战影响服务业
item.description: 五一小长假期间，中国游客的消费同比增长了 8%，达到 1,802.7 亿元人民币（合 249.2 亿美元），但仍低于疫情前的水平。【原文：Chinese travellers' spending rose 8% year-on-year during the May Day holiday to 180.27 billion yuan ($24.92 billion), but was still off pre-pandemic levels, while the country's services activity expanded at the slowest pace in seven months in April.】

item.title: 财新制造业采购经理人指数（PMI）显示，中国服务业增速因关税影响创7个月新低
item.description: 周二的一项私营部门调查显示，受美国关税带来的不确定性影响，4月份中国服务业活动增速为七个月来最慢，新订单增速较3月份有所放缓。【原文：China's services activity expanded at the slowest pace in seven months in April, with new orders growth slackening from March, weighed by uncertainty caused by U.S. tariffs, a private sector survey showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 亚洲同行大涨抑制美元走势
item.description: 周二，由于台湾货币史无前例地连续两天飙升，并波及其他地区同类货币，凸显了美元的脆弱性，美元走势举步维艰。【原文：The dollar struggled to make headway on Tuesday as an unprecedented two-day surge in its Taiwanese counterpart spilled over to other regional peers and highlighted the fragility of the U.S. currency.】

item.title: 澳大利亚西太平洋银行称 "最糟糕的时期已经过去"，并购融资需求强劲
item.description: 澳大利亚第二大住房贷款机构西太平洋银行（Westpac）首席执行官周二表示，随着抵押贷款压力的减轻和企业收购活动需求的上升，澳大利亚经济正显示出复苏的迹象。【原文：The CEO of Australia's second-largest home lender Westpac said on Tuesday the nation's economy was showing signs of recovery with reduced mortgage stress and rising demand for corporate buyout activity.】

item.title: Waymo 与麦格纳合作在亚利桑那州新建汽车工厂
item.description: Alphabet 的自动驾驶部门 Waymo 周一表示，该公司计划与加拿大汽车零部件供应商合作伙伴麦格纳国际公司（Magna International）合作，最快于今年在亚利桑那州的一家新工厂生产采用其自动驾驶技术的捷豹 I-PACE 和 Zeekr 汽车。【原文：Alphabet's self-driving unit Waymo said on Monday that it plans to build Jaguar I-PACE and Zeekr vehicles with its autonomous technology at a new plant in Arizona as soon as this year, with Canadian auto parts supplier partner Magna International .】

item.title: 律师称，尽管有非营利控制声明，埃隆-马斯克仍将继续对 OpenAI 提起诉讼
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的律师马克-托伯洛夫（Marc Toberoff）周一表示，埃隆-马斯克计划继续对 OpenAI 提起备受关注的诉讼，几个小时前，这家人工智能初创公司收回了早些时候提出的取消其非营利机构控制权的计划。【原文：Elon Musk plans to proceed with his highly-watched lawsuit against OpenAI, his lawyer Marc Toberoff said on Monday, hours after the AI startup dialed back its earlier plan to remove control by its non-profit arm.】

item.title: 伍德赛德首席运营官表示，寻求再出售 20%-30% 的路易斯安那液化天然气股份
item.description: 澳大利亚最大的天然气生产商伍德赛德能源公司（Woodside Energy）周二表示，将寻求进一步出售其价值 175 亿美元的路易斯安那液化天然气项目 20%-30% 的股份。【原文：Woodside Energy , Australia's top natural gas producer, said on Tuesday it would seek to sell a further 20%-30% stake in its $17.5 billion Louisiana LNG project.】

item.title: 在特朗普征收关税之际，香港 DIY 手表品牌将目光投向欧洲
item.description: 当华盛顿宣布提高关税并取消允许来自香港和中国大陆的低价值包裹免关税进入美国的 "微不足道 "规则时，Quinn Lai 觉得他的手表品牌 "完了"。【原文：When Washington announced higher tariffs and the axing of a de minimis rule that allowed for low-value packages from Hong Kong and mainland China to enter the United States free of duties, Quinn Lai felt it was "game over" for his watch brand.】

item.title: 石油在上一交易日跌至四年低点后回稳
item.description: 周二，石油价格在上一交易日触及四年低点后企稳，原因是欧佩克+（OPEC+）决定加速增产，在美国关税引发需求担忧之际，加剧了市场对供应过剩的担忧。【原文：Oil steadied on Tuesday after hitting four-year lows in the previous session that was driven by an OPEC+ decision to accelerate output increases, stoking fears of oversupply at a time when U.S. tariffs have spurred concerns about demand.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，OpenAI 同意以约 30 亿美元收购 Windsurf
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周一援引知情人士的话报道，OpenAI 已同意以约 30 亿美元的价格收购人工智能辅助编码工具 Windsurf。【原文：OpenAI has agreed to buy artificial intelligence-assisted coding tool Windsurf for about $3 billion, Bloomberg News reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国金融业领袖认为私人资产将进入更多投资者的投资组合
item.description: 金融高管们在米尔肯研究所周一举行的年度全球会议上表示，在未来数月和数年内，个人投资者可能会看到越来越多包含私人信贷的金融产品向他们走来。【原文：Individual investors are likely to see a growing array of financial products containing private credit heading their way in the coming months and years, financial executives said at the Milken Institute's annual global conference on Monday.】

item.title: 墨西哥 4 月份通胀率有所上升，但仍在目标范围内 - 路透社调查
item.description: 路透社周一对分析师进行的调查显示，墨西哥 4 月份的年通胀率可能有所上升，但仍保持在央行的目标范围内，这支持了央行将继续下调基准利率的预期。【原文：Mexico's annual inflation rate likely ticked up in April but remained within the central bank's target, a Reuters poll of analysts showed on Monday, supporting expectations that the central bank will continue cutting its benchmark interest rate.】

item.title: 众议院委员会提议修改联邦土地上的石油和煤炭开采政策
item.description: 众议院的一个小组本周将审议对国家石油和天然气钻探计划的全面修改，包括要求在墨西哥湾和阿拉斯加进行数十次租约出售，这些修改可能会在即将通过的预算法案中获得通过。【原文：A House of Representatives panel this week will consider sweeping changes to the nation's oil and gas drilling programs, including requiring dozens of lease sales in the Gulf of Mexico and Alaska, that could be passed in an impending budget bill.】

item.title: 威廉姆斯首席执行官艾伦-阿姆斯特朗（Alan Armstrong）在执掌公司 14 年后将卸任
item.description: 威廉姆斯公司（Williams Companies）周一表示，首席执行官艾伦-阿姆斯特朗（Alan Armstrong）将在执掌这家美国输油管道运营商超过 14 年后卸任。【原文：Williams Companies said on Monday CEO Alan Armstrong will step down after more than 14 years at the helm of the U.S. pipeline operator.】

item.title: 美国 TVA 负责人建议延长煤电厂寿命，环保组织誓言抗争
item.description: 美国田纳西河流域管理局（Tennessee Valley Authority）负责人表示，该公司的四座燃煤发电厂在计划于 2035 年关闭后仍可继续运营，环保组织周一对此表示抨击。【原文：Environmental groups on Monday slammed comments by the head of the U.S.-owned Tennessee Valley Authority suggesting the utility's four coal-fired power plants could continue to operate after a planned shutdown in 2035.】

item.title: 美国商品期货交易委员会（CFTC）采取行动，撤销对卡尔希事件合约案的上诉
item.description: 美国商品期货交易委员会（U.S. Commodity Futures Trading Commission）周一决定放弃对一项法院判决的上诉，该判决允许纽约衍生品交易平台 KalshiEX LLC 列出美国人可以用来押注选举结果的合约。【原文：The U.S. Commodity Futures Trading Commission on Monday moved to drop its appeal of a court decision that allowed New York derivatives trading platform KalshiEX LLC to list contracts Americans can use to bet on election outcomes.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：普华永道会计师事务所将在美国裁员 1500 人
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周一报道，四大会计师事务所普华永道将在美国裁员约1500人。【原文：Big Four accounting firm PwC is laying off about 1,500 employees in the U.S., the Financial Times reported on Monday.】

item.title: 百时美施贵宝首席执行官表示，5 年内将在美国投资 400 亿美元
item.description: 百时美施贵宝公司首席执行官克里斯托弗-博纳（Christopher Boerner）在《统计新闻》（Stat News）周一发表的一篇评论文章中写道：未来五年，百时美施贵宝公司将在美国投入 400 亿美元。【原文：Bristol Myers Squibb will spend $40 billion in the US over the next five years, CEO Christopher Boerner wrote in an opinion piece published by Stat News on Monday.】

item.title: 交易日：关税不确定性依然存在
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 页岩气生产商科特拉能源公司（Coterra Energy）公布季度利润增长，下调支出目标
item.description: 美国页岩油生产商科特拉能源公司（Coterra Energy）周一公布第一季度利润增长，但表示将降低年度资本支出计划，以应对宏观经济的不确定性。【原文：U.S. shale producer Coterra Energy reported a rise in first-quarter profit on Monday, but said it would lower its annual capital expenditure plan in response to the macroeconomic uncertainty.】

item.title: 独家报道：美国加征关税，Shein和Temu加大在英国和法国的广告投放力度
item.description: 市场情报公司Sensor Tower的数据显示，4月份，从中国发货的快时尚电商平台Shein和Temu增加了在欧洲的数字广告支出。【原文：Shein and Temu, fast-fashion e-commerce platforms that ship merchandise from China, boosted their spending on digital ads in Europe in April, data from market intelligence firm Sensor Tower showed, a shift away from the U.S., where the companies face crushing tariffs.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）总裁格奥尔基耶娃表示，IMF一直认为中国需要改变经济模式
item.description: 国际货币基金组织总裁克里斯塔琳娜-格奥尔基耶娃（Kristalina Georgieva）周一表示，国际货币基金组织一直在为中国摆脱出口导向型增长模式开出政策处方。【原文：International Monetary Fund Managing Director Kristalina Georgieva on Monday said the IMF has been vocal about its policy prescriptions for China to move away from an export-led growth model.】

item.title: 面对市场不确定性，KKR 联合创始人表示 "保持冷静，继续前进
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普贸易政策的不确定性导致全球股市暴跌，KKR 联合创始人乔治-罗伯茨（George Roberts）周一试图缓解投资者的焦虑情绪。【原文：KKR co-founder George Roberts tried to ease investor anxiety on Monday as uncertainty over U.S. President Donald Trump's trade policies have caused global stock markets to swoon.】

item.title: 经济不确定性导致消费需求疲软，高乐氏下调年度销售预期
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收关税引发的经济不确定性，漂白剂生产商消费需求疲软，高乐氏（Clorox）周一下调了年度销售预期。【原文：Clorox trimmed its annual sales forecast on Monday, as the bleach maker saw weak consumer demand in the backdrop of economic uncertainty spurred by U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs.】
